name: World of Comenius
description:
This is a small demo of project called "World of Comenius", educational

infoverse that utilizes modern technology to change the way we learn and

communicate.

You can find and try several concept ideas, that were made for the 3DJam

and point to the direction the project is heading. Keep a lookout, because

there's a lot more coming!

-----------------------------

Lead designer & developer: Tomas "Frooxius" Mariancik

Design & Testing (also business relations): Karel Hulec
